SimpleGraph - Interface in com.bitplan.simplegraph.core
The Simple Graph interface is inspired by the mathematical concept of a graph: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Graph_(discrete_mathematics) it wraps an Apache Tinkerpop / Gremlin Graph and allows generic graph traversals a graph can also be used in cases where you'd normally use lists, tables and trees - the graph is the more general concept
simpleGraph - Variable in class com.bitplan.simplegraph.impl.SimpleNodeImpl
 
SimpleGraphImpl - Class in com.bitplan.simplegraph.impl
default implementation of SimpleGraph interface - wraps a TinkerPop 3 graph
SimpleGraphImpl() - Constructor for class com.bitplan.simplegraph.impl.SimpleGraphImpl
 
SimpleGraphImpl(SimpleGraph) - Constructor for class com.bitplan.simplegraph.impl.SimpleGraphImpl
construct me from the given simple Graph
SimpleNode - Interface in com.bitplan.simplegraph.core
The SimpleNode interface represents a Vertex in a graph https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Vertex_(graph_theory) it wraps an Apache TinkerPop vertex
SimpleNode.EdgeDirection - Enum in com.bitplan.simplegraph.core
 
SimpleNodeImpl - Class in com.bitplan.simplegraph.impl
default implementation of a SimpleNode wraps a Tinkerpop/Gremlin Vertex
SimpleNodeImpl(SimpleGraph, String, String...) - Constructor for class com.bitplan.simplegraph.impl.SimpleNodeImpl
initialize me for the given graph
SimpleSystem - Interface in com.bitplan.simplegraph.core
a System that allows access to a graph that is wrapped by the system
SimpleSystemImpl - Class in com.bitplan.simplegraph.impl
implementation of a simple System that is to be wrapped to be handled using Apache TinkerPop3 hiding some of the complexity
SimpleSystemImpl() - Constructor for class com.bitplan.simplegraph.impl.SimpleSystemImpl
 
SimpleSystemImpl(SimpleGraph) - Constructor for class com.bitplan.simplegraph.impl.SimpleSystemImpl
